title: ISO miscuts and errors and Cobb Authentic
author: Brass23

posts.post_title: ISO miscuts and errors and Cobb Authentic
posts.post_content:
Hi!

Looking to purchase any error T206s including printer scraps, miscuts, color variations, upside down backs and Ty Cobb graded authentic cards.
Thanks for reading!

DB
If you're interested in any of these, feel free to shoot me a message.

Friend of mine has this but has issues posting pictures. He'll follow up on this post with his info if you are interested. It's a great card!

[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/53270220374_c96572c2c2_c_d.jpg[/IMG]

Hi, huge shoutout to Scott for getting my picture to load, that’s my Collins. Feel free to PM me if you are interested.

Thanks, 
-Drew
